name: Poker Extra - Texas Holdem
description:
If you're ready let's start to play some Hold'em Poker.

Poker Extra lets you play it on your iOS device! Challenge with friends and new poker players!
Becoming a poker star is a long journey; you will start as a rookie and work all the way up to become a high roller with the ultimate goal to become a VIP Poker star. The variety of poker games gives every player the desired poker experience. Poker Extra gives you a thousands of chips, gifts for free. You can play with your guest account or your Facebook account.


PLAY WITH POKER BUDDIES – Invite your friends, kick back and make it a poker night anytime!
REGISTRATION – Connect with Facebook or use guest mode to play poker without Facebook registration
OFFICIAL CASH GAME EXPERIENCE – Try your hand at Texas Hold’Em, High Stakes Table, and more for FREE.
LEARN HOW TO PLAY LIKE A REAL PRO - This your first step to become a real professional poker player!
JOIN ONLINE POKER TOURNAMENTS - Become a champion!
publishers: DIGITOY INTERAKTIF TEKNOLOJILERI BILISIM YAZILIM TICARET LTD STI
